description:
"Catherine, who works at the Snack House Otose used to be called Keys Catherine. She used to loot treasures form across the galaxy and easily opened any safe, no matter how secure. But now, she is deeply grateful to Otose for rehiring her, despite the fact that she stole money from her shop, and is living an honest life. Kurikan, one of Catherine`s old thief buddies, suddenly appears before her. He tells her that he wants her help…  Odd jobs have a request to investigate an affair. According to Michiko, the client, her husband has lately been coming home late at night every day and his clothes have smelled of perfume. But her husband has an unexpected secret…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A: Männer haben eine Schwäche für Bäckerinnen und Blumenhändlerinnen!;B: Redet ihr über Heldentaten vergangener Tage, dann übertreibt dabei um 30 Prozent. Hauptsache, ihr hebt die Atmosphäre.
Hanaya Toka Cake ya no Musume ni Otoko wa Yowai / Mukashi no Buyuuden wa Sanwarimashi de Hanase
Heroic Stories of the Past Are Exaggerated by Three Folds / Boys Are Weak Towards Girls from a Flower Shop or a Cake Shop
昔の武勇伝は三割増で話せ 盛り上がればいいんだよ盛り上がれば / 花屋とかケーキ屋の娘に男は弱い
